actions.description: Actions with shortcuts and gestures. One section for each OS, all must be maintained.

show_all_toggle.description: Whether to toggle all extensions or none / hidden extensions only

render_in_dropdown.description: Whether to display the extension icons in the extension popup menu

visible.description: Whether the extension toolbars is visible or not.

hidden_extensions.description: Whether an extension action button are hidden or not. List of extension ids.

cutcopy_encoded.description: URL encode the string passed to the clipboard from the url field

display.description: Search field visibility; 'disabled' option (2) is no longer in use

show_keyword.description: Show search engine nickname/keyword in the search field dropdown

in_new_tab.description: To always open Search field searches in a new tab

keep_selected.description: Keep last search engine selected in search field

typed_history.description: History of searches made with the search field

suggest_enabled.description: Allow search suggestions in Address field

suggest_on_nickname.description: Only allow search suggestions in Address field on search engine nickname match

select_on_click.description: Select the content of the URL field when it gets activated

show_qr_generator.description: Controls the visibility of QR button.

url_open_shortcut.description: Which modifier key to use for opening the url in a new tab

confirm_adding.description: Always show dialog when adding a bookmarks via shortcut

confirm_opening.description: Ask before opening a number of bookmarks >= to kBookmarksConfirmOpeningThreshold

language.description: Set on first run. Upgrades will use this language when needed

save_folder.description: Last Folder a bookmark was added to in url field

show_extensions_banner.description: Show the Vivaldi banner on the extensions page or not.

onboarding_shown.description: Flag to store if calendar onboarding has been shown.

templates_version.description: Keep track of default templates version. To know when to update.

week_number_rule.description: What is the first week. Values represent the day of January that must be in week #1

default_allday_notification.description: Should a reminder be created for all day events.

default_allday_notification_time.description: Value is number of minutes from start of event. Can be negative

click_time_slot.description: Action to take when clicking on an empty calendar slot

click_outside.description: Action to take when clicking outside of an event being edited

send_invite_email_action.description: [DEPRECATED 2023/04] VB-95463, Sending of invite emails to attendees, 'ask' shows a dialog for user

time_increments.description: Resolution of time display in day / week views

only_hourly_divider.description: Whether to show grid lines for half hour / quarters

only_hourly_keynav.description: Whether to split navigation cells to half hour / quarters

default_duration.description: Default calendar event duration, in milliseconds

auto_tab_datetime.description: Whether to automatically move focus on complete date/time typed

selected_pane.description: Calendar status popup last selected pane

handle_ics_downloads.description: Whether Calendar should handle downloaded ics files when opened inside Vivaldi

handle_webcal_links.description: Whether Calendar should handle links starting with webcal

open_panel_on_new.description: Opens the download panel when starting a new download

start_automatically.description: Automatically download files to the default download folder without asking the user

update_default_download_when_saving_as.description: Update default download directory when setting download target via 'Save as...'

lights.description: List of selected light MAC addresses

username.description: Hue access token, called username in the API

devices.description: The devices we want to integrate with. Valid options: keyboard, mouse, mousemat, chromalink

has_shown_promotion.description: Has shown Razer Chroma promotion dialog.

alt_opens_menu.description: Pressing Alt opens the main menu

space_fast_forwards.description: Pressing space when a page is scrolled to the bottom will trigger fast-forward

tab_to_all.description: Whether the tab key allows reaching all controls or only text inputs and lists

tab_to_all_uses_system_default.description: Set tab_to_all based on the operating system configuration

accounts.description: Mail account credentials for each set up account

add_archive_folder.description: Shall archive action create archive folder if it is missing for source account

auto_generate_contacts.description: Auto generate contacts based on recipients in sent messages

panel_activity_indicators_enabled.description: Show activity indicators in the Mail Panel

panel_show_error_messages.description: Display error messages in Mail Panel

switcher_enabled.description: Show unread count in panel switcher

unseen_enabled.description: Show counters for unseen messages in the Mail Panel

drafts_enabled.description: Show counters for draft messages in the Mail Panel

trash_enabled.description: Show counter for messages in the Mail Panel trash folder

junk_enabled.description: Show counter for messages in the Mail Panel junk folder

archive_enabled.description: Show counter for messages in the Mail Panel Archive folder

status_button_enabled.description: Show unread count in status button

check_interval.description: How often to check for new mail, in minutes or false for manually

preferred_rendering.description: How to render message. prefer_html will pick a text/html part and use text/plain as fallback. plaintext renders a text/plain part with text/html converted to text as fallback.

color_quoted_text.description: Color quoted text or only quoted border in a mail

composer_colors.description: Changes the default colors of fonts and background for viewing in the composer

compose_headers_hidden.description: What header fields are hidden in mail message header when composing

contact_default_action.description: Selecting a contact can either view all messages or compose a message

default_account.description: The one mail account that shall be the default account when sending mail

delete_in_other_locations.description: Whether Vivaldi should propagate permanent message deletion to other accounts and folders

imap_logs_on.description: Are imap actions logged in debug console or not?

is_turned_off.description: Is mail client turned on or off?

last_sent_from.description: The mail account that was most recently used to send from

mark_delete_in_other_locations.description: Whether Vivaldi should propagate marking message as deleted to other accounts and folders

notifications_on_successfully_sent.description: Show a mail notification when a message is successfully sent

read_headers_hidden.description: What header fields are hidden in mail message header when reading

send_or_queue.description: Should button in Mail Composer Send directly or Queue to Outbox?

search_sort_order.description: The order in which mail messages are sorted

search_sort_field.description: The field used when sorting mail messages

single_click_tabs.description: Open mail tabs with single click

display_mail_panel_viewing_mail.description: Display Mail Panel when Viewing Mail

smtp_logs_on.description: Are smtp actions logged in debug console?

selected_pane.description: Mail status popup last selected pane

view_dimensions.description: Dimensions of mail list and detail view

search_on_enter.description: Start mail search by pressing enter key

include_identifying_headers.description: Include identifying headers in outgoing messages

auto_mark_as_read.description: Automatically mark unread mail as read when selected

list_buttons.description: Kind of mail list buttons to show above mail list

display.description: App menu display on Linux and Windows

notifications.description: Enable notifications when receiving chat messages

debug_output.description: Enable console output for debug purposes

notifications_sound_on.description: Play sound when receiving chat messages

typing_indication.description: Let other people see you're typing a message

process_hint_no_store.description: Tell the server not to store the outgoing message

conversation_timestamps.description: Store timestamps for conversations locally. Until XEP-0333 is implemented.

tabMode.description: Open conversations in tabs from the panel

alt_gestures_enabled.description: Allow gestures using Alt key and left mouse button

stroke_tolerance.description: How many logical pixels the mouse has to travel before the mouse gesture move is detected. This is not syncable as it is a device-specific.

page_zoom.description: Zoom pages with a mouse wheel or touchpad

tab_switch.description: Switch tabs with a mouse wheel or touchpad

add_screenshot.description: Automatically fetch a screenshot for new notes

show_markdown.description: Display the notes text formatted using markdown
Display the notes text formatted using markdown

elements.description: Data for panels. An object entry contains an 'id', 'width', 'resizable' and 'floating' if present. The id must be one those in Toolsbars | panel, the rest are optional,

show_folder_badge.description: Show a badge with the number of children

show_toggle.description: Show toggle button along the edge of the panel

window_defaults.description: Same as 'state', but not with same values for 'selectedPanel'.

automatic.description: Let panel automatically execute a translation on a selection in document.

paste.description: Let panel automatically execute a translation when text is pasted.

redirect.description: Let panel execute a translation instead of built-in dialog in document.

version.description: Last upgrade of default panels. Format is browser version

elements.description: Default web panel list. The id must be one those in Toolsbars | panel.

removed_elements.description: List of web panels removed by user.

modified_elements.description: Id list of bundled web panels that have been removed or modified

removed_items.description: [DEPRECATED 2022/11] List of web panels removed by user.

modified.description: [DEPRECATED 2022/11] Id list of bundled web panels that have been removed or modified

version.description: Last upgrade of default web panels. Format is browser version

list.description: [DEPRECATED 2021/03] Kept for import to 'items' and backward compatibility.

removed_list.description: [DEPRECATED 2021/03] Obsolete. Kept for import to 'removed_items'and backward compatibility.

toolbar.description: Web panel toolbar and navigation controls display

enabled.description: Enables update and loading of the block-list.

last_update.description: Last time we did a successfull update of the block-list.

block_list_url.description: URL to the most recent block-list.

block_list_sha256_url.description: URL to a sha256 sum of the most recent block-list.

update_interval.description: Time between the block-list download refresh in hours.

deleted_command_list.description: A list of deleted, default chains

open_url_in_new_tab.description: Open QC links in a new tab, overriding global setting

match_nickname.description: Launch QC bookmark on its nickname match

show_bookmarks.description: Include bookmarks in QC search results

show_reading_list.description: Include Reading List in QC search results

show_calculator.description: Include calculator in QC search results

show_history.description: Include history in QC search results

show_notes.description: Include notes in QC search results

show_extensions.description: Include extensions in QC search results

show_page_actions.description: Include page actions in QC search results

keep_value.description: Keep value in QC search between open and close

limit_results.description: Limit number of QC search results to 20 per category

search_english.description: Search in English translation term of command

bypassList.description: List of urls that shall not pass through the proxy. Format: See https://developer.chrome.com/docs/extensions/reference/proxy/

connectStrategy.description: How a relay server is selected when a connection is made.

open_in_new_window.description: Open sessions in a new window (when using the dialog)

save_all_workspaces.description: Save information of all workspaces when saving a session

save_on_exit.description: Automatically save current set of pages to the session history on exit

save_days.description: Number of days session backups are kept.

save_version.description: Holds a key telling how sessions backups are saved.

in_tab.description: Open settings in a tab instead of standalone window

mono_icons.description: Use monochrome color for icons in Settings

navigation.description: Controls Speed Dial navigation display in internal pages

allow_dnd.description: Allow Speed Dial entries reordering by drag & drop

display_navigation.description: [DEPRECATED 2020/4] Controls Speed Dial navigation display in other Start Page components

display_search.description: Display search field on Speed Dial page

game_button_show.description: Show Game button on the Speed Dial

privacy_stats_show.description: Display privacy statistics in the SpeedDial

check_is_default.description: Check if vivaldi is default on startup (not synced to allow people to have different default browser on different computers)

has_seen_feature.description: Most recent major feature shown in welcome page. 'none' means the initial welcome content pre mail. Appaned new features to enum when needed in increasing order.

last_seen_version.description: Most recent version number seen on startup

remember_full_screen.description: Re-open vivaldi in full-screen if it was closed in full-screen. Unofficial setting, not exposed in the UI for now.

show_ffmpeg_information.description: Show dialog on startup regarding media support. Linux only.

show_media_available_information.description: Show dialog on startup regarding media support on Windows N-versions.

show_git_directory_warning.description: Set to Git repo path on startup if we store a |.gitignore| file in the profile folder and find .git directories somewhere in the profile folder.

minimized.description: Determines whether to hide or overlay Status Bar

on_clone.description: Tab activation after clonning a tab

on_close.description: Tab activation after closing a tab

active_min_size.description: Enforced minimum size of active tab

align_next.description: Align close buttons with closed tab by freezing tab size for duration of hover

at_edge.description: Remove vertical space around tab bar in fullscreen mode

slider_xpos.description: Vertical tab bar split when second row active

slider_ypos.description: Horizontal tab bar split when second row active

close_pinned.description: Whether pinned tabs can be closed or buried

cycle_by_recent_order.description: Whether to cycle tabs by recently seen or linear order

focus_webview.description: Focus webpage instead of address bar on new tab

minimize.description: Click active tab to switch to previously active one

confirm_closing_tabs.description: Ask before closing a number of tabs >= to kTabsConfirmClosingThreshold

link.description: New tab link type, one of NEW_PAGE_TYPE constant

url.description: [DEPRECATED 2018-11] The actual URL for new tabs

custom_url.description: The URL set to be used when choosing a custom URL for new tabs

open_new_in_background.description: A new tab opens without taking focus

include_active.description: Include current tab in new selection

allow_dnd.description: Allow tab stacking by drag & drop

dnd_delay.description: Delay before triggering tab stacking by drag & drop

prefer_dotted.description: Use Dotted Tabs to visualize the stack

substrip_locked.description: Keep the second tab bar open when empty

name_map.description: Keeps local track of tab stack name changes

open_in_current.description: Open links within current tab stack

auto_expand.description: Expand accordions automatically when tab is activated

thumbnails.description: Show page preview thumbnail within a tab

visible.description: Whether to show the tab bar

enable.description: Enable tab preview overlay when switching tabs

list_layout.description: Show tab preview overlay as list

css_ui_mods_directory.description: CSS modifications directory where *.css files will be injected from.

range_buttons.description: Use buttons instead of slider in range controls

enabled.description: Enable automatic translations. Used to set the chromium setting which we unfortunately hardcoded to be disabled in the past.

dim_blurred.description: Dim colors in windows without focus

private_window.description: Theme to use in Private Window

user_image.description: [TO BE DEPRECATED] Kept for migration, also used as temporary holding when selecting image

simple_scrollbar.description: Win/Linux: prefer narrow scroll bars without buttons

current_buttons.description: Reference to a theme to use custom buttons from

prefer_custom_buttons.description: Prefer custom theme buttons in toolbars

preview.description: List of currently previewed themes. Currently only the first element if any is used.

sizes.description: Store the preferred size of toolbar button popouts

device_id.description: An random GUID that uniquely identifies the device to the authentication server. It is reset when logging out.

id.description: The actual username obtained from the server

username.description: The username as entered by the user

access_keys.description: Allows web pages to use access keys if turned on, otherwise blocks them.

directory.description: The location where captured pages are stored

save_file_pattern.description: The file pattern used to contruct the filename.

focus_trap.description: Controls keyboard TAB focus trapping within individual UI toolbars and/or a webpage.

show_bubble.description: Show an info bubble telling the user to use Esc to exit full screen.

enabled.description: Show a PIP button overlaying video elements.

spatial_navigation_method.description: [DEPRECATED 2020/02] version of spatnav parameter kept around for migration.

enabled.description: Show a translate selected text button when selecting text.

allow_selection_in_links.description: Allowing the injection of boss-select into all frames. Turning this off will disable the ability to select text inside link elements.

settings.description: List of settings for RSS feeds

show_notifications.description: Should new feeds notifications be shown

detect_feeds.description: Inject feeds detection code into web pages?

notifier.description: Displays information about current update state

schedule.description: Determines how interactive the update process should be

button_show_date.description: Show current date in the Clock button title

button_show_name.description: Show the current timer name in the title

notification_sound.description: Sound played when a clock timer triggers

timers.description: List of active alarms and countdowns

list.description: A list of all the workspaces

show_in_tabbar.description: Display Workspace button in Tab Bar

show_name.description: Always show name in workspace button

accent_color.description: The app accent color, RRGGBB hex values. Maps to --colorHighlightBg.

highlight_color.description: The text highlight color, RRGGBB hex values

refresh_tokens.description: Store encrypted oauth refresh-tokens per account using OAuth authentication for reconnecting on restart

device_id.description: An random GUID that uniquely identifies the device to the authentication server. It never changes
